meanings.definition: To make (something) superficially attractive or acceptable.
meanings.sent1: She cosmeticized her resume to impress the employer.
meanings.sent2: The company cosmeticized the product packaging to boost sales.
meanings.sent3: He cosmeticized his excuses to avoid getting in trouble.
meanings.sent4: The politician cosmeticized his promises to win votes.
meanings.sent5: The real estate agent cosmeticized the flaws of the house to make a sale.

meanings.definition: To apply cosmetics to enhance appearance.
meanings.sent1: She cosmeticized her face before the party.
meanings.sent2: The actress cosmeticized for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: He cosmeticized his pet for a funny photoshoot.
meanings.sent4: The model cosmeticized her features for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent5: The bride cosmeticized her look for the wedding day.
